vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπερνῑκάω,
prevail completely over, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; to be more than conqueror, [NT+4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to thoroughly conquer, go beyond conquest
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to thoroughly conquer, go beyond conquest
to overpower in victory; to be abundantly victorious, prevail mightily, go beyond conquest Rom. 8:37*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: conquistar totalmente, tener la victoria completa
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chiến thắng dư dật; vượt thắng hơn
